overview: The happiness of their family has begun to suffocate after Aizuddin received a phone call from his friend, Herman (Teuku Zacky) who brought the news unexpectedly when he was told that he had a son named Alexander (Light Rizky Saputra) as a result of his brief relationship with Sandra (Wulan Guritno), a European woman a few years ago.  Zul Ariffin's Heart of Grief The destruction of a wife's heart when loyalty and affection are forgiven by dishonesty.  How to break a child's heart when a man is honored and respected by a dutiful act.
title: Permata Hati
